announcement_bar.text: FREE Shipping On Orders Over USD $60

main_header.layout: horizontal flex container with space-between alignment

additional_feature.title: Trend This Week
additional_feature.content: mega-menu section featuring trending products with images and details
additional_feature.display: appears on hover of a nav item (e.g. an icon or menu item) and shows a grid of trending products with image, name, price, etc

cart.icon_type: shopping bag icon with item count
cart.interaction: click opens cart drawer with cart contents

currency_selector.position: in footer on desktop (and in mobile menu)

responsive_behavior.desktop: Full menu bar with dropdown/mega-menu on hover. Icons (search, account, cart) displayed inline.
responsive_behavior.tablet_mobile: Compact header with hamburger icon for menu. Logo centered. Search, account, cart might move to a bottom fixed bar for quick access. Menu opens in a full-screen drawer when hamburger tapped.

slides.headline: Khamrah Dukhan – SHIPPING NOW

explore_collections.title: Explore
explore_collections.text_style: links or buttons for each collection name

about_section.heading: About Lattafa USA
about_section.text: Lattafa Perfumes is a distinguished name in the world of fragrances, offering an exquisite range of scents that captivate the senses and elevate every moment. With a commitment to quality and innovation, we craft perfumes that embody sophistication, luxury, and individuality.
about_section.additional_text: Drawing inspiration from the rich heritage of perfumery, our creations reflect a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. Each fragrance is meticulously crafted using the finest ingredients sourced from around the globe, ensuring an unparalleled olfactory experience. Experience the allure of Lattafa Perfumes and indulge in the art of fragrance mastery.
about_section.layout: two-column on desktop (text and images), stacked on mobile

newsletter_signup.terms_text: By subscribing you agree to the Terms of Use & Privacy Policy.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Lattafa-Usa.com. All rights reserved. Designed and Developed by Lattafa
footer.layout: 4-column grid on desktop, collapsing to accordion or stacked on mobile
footer.responsive: Columns stack vertically on small screens; social icons and currency selector center-align on mobile.

mobile_nav_bar.behavior: Icons open respective pages or overlays; highlights active section
mobile_nav_bar.example: Home, Search, Cart, Products, About icons are shown in a bottom bar on mobile

search_overlay.layout: full-screen overlay with search input and suggestions
search_overlay.responsive: fills screen on mobile, centers on desktop
search_overlay.note: The overlay shows most-searched keywords and products for quick access

cart_drawer.trigger: cart icon click or 'Add to cart' action

content.title: Your Cart
content.items_list: list of products added with thumbnail, name, quantity, price
content.free_shipping_notice: You are eligible for free shipping. Spend $X more to reach free shipping!
content.empty_state: Looks like your cart is empty.

cart_drawer.close_button: X icon at top or click overlay backdrop
cart_drawer.responsive: full-screen modal on very small screens
cart_drawer.example_content: Empty cart shows a message and suggested collections
